quotes.quote: There's never a new fashion but it's old.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: A fashion is nothing but an induced epidemic.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I base my fashion taste on what doesn't itch.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Every generation laughs at the old fashions, but follows religiously the new.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I once had a sparrow alight upon my shoulder for a moment, while I was hoeing in a village garden, and I felt that I was more distinguished by that circumstance that I should have been by any epaulet I could have worn.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I cannot and will not cut my conscience to fit this year's fashions.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Fashion is something that goes in one year and out the other.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The average American can get into the kingdom of heaven much more easily than he can get into the Boulevard St. Germain.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: What a deformed thief this fashion is.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
